entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Wabush Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:02 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Wabush Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:20 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -29.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wabush Airport 2:56 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -29.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 56 %
Wind Chill: -44
Dewpoint: -35.0°C
Wind: WNW 27 km/h gust 54 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending this afternoon then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 50 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening then becoming light near midnight. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
